title: Marcy Kaptur - Wikipedia
snippet: In her first term, she was appointed to the Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs Committee as well as the Veteransâ€™ Affairs Committee. During the 1980s, she developed a good working relationship with Speaker Jim Wright, who later appointed her as vice chair of a task force on trade and to the Democratic Steering and Policy Committee. In her fourth term, she gained a position on the Budget Committee and afterwards secured a seat on the Appropriations Committee. In 1987, Kaptur introduced the World War II Memorial Act in the House.
